app_description: DeftPDF Document translation Instantly translates documents into 130 languages. You can use our app to translate document in Pdf Docx Pptx Xlsx Txt and Html formats. here are the key benefits: Instantly translate and preserve the layout of any document format Support 130 languages No registration required no more hassle No watermarks. Large files supported! you can translate more than 500 pages Support Scanned PDF format: we use optical character recognition OCR technology to extract and translate text in the document with AI while retaining the original layout. Pricing: 3 pages are free no subscription needed! pay as you go price is calculated based on document page count Note: there is NO free translation option for scanned document.
